name: Kill Zombies All
description:
A village is damaged by zombies
All villager were left all or die caused of zombies
You hate zombies , You want to kill zombies all
You like hunting, shooting, killing zombies
This is very basic of zombies sniper game
Come and shoot zombies all
- This is very basic game of zombies sniper , swipe to focus on zombies
- Turn fire on and shoot zombies
- You have to reload your gun each time after shooting zombies
You like action , role play games , zombies shooting , killing zombies , sniper , try this zombies sniper game .
Take funny and relax guys.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vvjqQJ_3V1c&feature=youtu.be
